## SendableLiquity.registerFrontend() method

Register current wallet address as a Liquity frontend.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerFrontend(kickbackRate: Decimalish): Promise<SentLiquityTransaction<S, LiquityReceipt<R, void>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  kickbackRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The portion of OPL rewards to pass onto users of the frontend (between 0 and 1). |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[SentLiquityTransaction](./lib-base.sentliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [LiquityReceipt](./lib-base.liquityreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;
